description: For the fans of Laela Knight, here is her sister, Lana Knight. You may even think they are related - and maybe there are! Lana Knight makes her TsSeuction debut in our medical role play. John plays along all the way up until her cock comes out and then he's even more excited! His own balls have been drained and now it's Lana's turn to fuck him until she cums. The sex is so hot, John cums again!
title: Playing Doctor with Her Study Partner: The Debut of Lana Knight.
